articles.title: Not unlike his playing days, Year 2 Tom Brady is putting it together in the broadcast booth
articles.description:
Brady still does have lingering flaws, but he has figured out an essential part of the job: recognizing the complexities on the field and breaking them down for an audience eager to learn.

The post Not unlike his playing days, Year 2 Tom Brady is putting it together in the broadcast booth appeared first on Boston.com.
